modes.title: Freestyle Destruction
modes.description: Unleash chaos in arenas designed for ultimate **monster truck destruction**. Score points for smashing obstacles and performing epic stunts.

modes.title: Offroad Race
modes.description: Compete against rivals on challenging **offroad tracks**. Navigate treacherous terrain and be the first to cross the finish line.

modes.title: Mud Bogging Challenge
modes.description: Test your **truck's** power in deep mud pits. Conquer the bog by maintaining momentum and avoiding getting stuck.

modes.title: Stunt Showdown
modes.description: Perform gravity-defying jumps and daring tricks to impress the crowd. Master aerial maneuvers and perfect landings to earn the highest score.

modes.title: Expedition Mode
modes.description: Embark on expansive **offroad adventures** across diverse landscapes. Discover hidden paths, complete exploration objectives, and overcome environmental challenges.
